channel.title: Running
channel.description: For energy regaining I need a way of adding energy with a specific delay per player without creating an event just for that player. Also; if anyone has any idea on how weight effects energy regaining PM me.

item.title: Running

item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

For energy regaining I need a way of adding energy with a specific delay per player without creating an event just for that player. Also; if anyone has any idea on how weight effects energy regaining PM me.
